Package util.logging

Provides classes and interfaces for easy logging.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationManager
    The ConfigurationManager manages logging configurations as its name describes.
    LevelX
    The LevelX class is an eXtendend version of Level class.
    Logger
    A Logger logs messages.
    LoggerManager
    The LoggerManager registers Loggers by their name and manages them.
    StandardConsoleHandler
    The StandardConsoleHandler is a ConsoleHandler which logs to System.out.
    StandardFormatter
    The StandardFormatter formats LogRecords in a human-readable way.

Package util.logging Description

Provides classes and interfaces for easy logging. Lightweight and Simple Java Logging (lsjl).

The util.logging API is an additional layer on top of Java™ 2 platform's core logging facilities, providing a simpler yet more intuitive access to logging.

Author:
Loris
